channel.title: System Update Command! I REALLY NEED HELP!
channel.description: Ok the command that Administrators can use, that would make "System update in _:__" appear in the split private chat section of the game, if I already had that in my client, what would I search to find it? If I didn't, what would the commmand be? Please Help!!!

item.title: System Update Command! I REALLY NEED HELP!
item.dc:creator: @t3h_0wn4g3 t3h 0wn4g3
item.description:
@t3h_0wn4g3 wrote:

[quote=“I Metal I, post:4, topic:102400”][quote author=link1011 link=topic=146754.msg1396562#msg1396562 date=1180491048]
Ok, when time runs out, will the server automatically shutdown?
[/quote]

yes (it should anyways)[/quote]
yes it will.
but for some reasons, sometimes( rare occasions lol ) it can crash your server ( did to me and " zomgs ")

Read full topic
item.source: System Update Command! I REALLY NEED HELP!

item.title: System Update Command! I REALLY NEED HELP!

item.description:

::update (time in seconds)

so

::update 120 would be two mins
